events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to know how I can get a refund or an exchange for the correct size.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting a refund or exchange.
An agent has been assigned to assist the customer with their refund request regarding the wrong jacket size received.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you'd like to return or exchange your jacket. I’m here to help you with the process.
Could you please confirm the order number and provide a photo of the jacket label showing the size you received? This will help us process your refund or exchange quickly.
Sure, my order number is 78945123 and I’ve attached a photo showing the tag with size large, but I ordered medium.

Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order and provide a prepaid return label for the jacket. Additionally, we can send out the correct size medium jacket right away if you want.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to send the correct size immediately. Please go ahead with the exchange and refund for the returned jacket.
We've processed your refund and shipped the medium size jacket today. You will receive an email with the return shipping label shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you’ve received the replacement jacket and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the new jacket arrived in perfect condition and fits well. Thank you for your excellent support during this process.
We’re glad to hear you’re satisfied with the replacement. We will now close this case. Thank you for contacting us!
